The Buddha said this dharani has great merit.
If someone can wear it on their head,
all rakshasas, pisacas, and other such ghosts,
within a thousand yojanas, will not be able to harm them.
Moreover, if someone recites this dharani once,
at that time,
there will be devas and their retinue,
dwelling outside a thousand yojanas, who will provide protection.
Moreover, when someone recites this dharani,
all siddhas and great evil tigers, wolves, and other beasts,
will naturally submit and will not be able to harm them.
Moreover, if someone can give rise to utmost sincerity,
and recite this dharani a hundred times every day,
that person will attain the accomplishment of the medicine of anjana.
Using it to apply to the eyes, one will be able to see the events of the three times.
Moreover, when someone recites this dharani,
Causing those with angry minds to give rise to a respectful and loving mind.
Moreover, if a person sincerely recites this dharani two lakh times,
All afflictions can be completely extinguished. If a person recites this dharani for a long time,
That person will then attain the wisdom of past lives.
Moreover, if a person uses this dharani
To consecrate pure oil and apply it to the head and abdomen,
If that person has a headache, stomachache, or any other evil poison-like illness,
The illness will be cured wherever the oil is applied.
Moreover, if a person takes a single grain of black pepper,
Consecrates it with this dharani twenty-one times,
And brings it to the king,
Whatever they wish for will be accomplished as they wish.
This dharani has great merit.
If one wishes to accomplish the above-mentioned matters,
One should uphold it.
